# About Myself

I am **Eunice Liu** from [Jiangxi Province, China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiangxi). I studied in Hong Kong for my high school and undergraduate degree. I majored in quantitative finance at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. 

My hobbies are:

- Biking
- Music
- Singing
